text: Shooting many smaller projectiles instead of one large one is more effective when fighting multiple small targets, such as infantry units.
This is the standard shot type for this unit.
Does more damage than Standard Round, but is less accurate. Most effective against infantry.
Does more damage, but is less accurate and slower. Can cause buildings to catch fire.
Reduces enemy's melee attack and defence & causes fatigue. Also reduces firing range.
Causes less damage, but has a fearsome sound. Adversely affects the morale, melee attack & firing rate of targets & any unit they pass over.
This is the standard shot type for this unit.
Has greater range but causes less damage.
Does more damage, but is less accurate and slower. Can cause buildings to catch fire.
